string.name: changelog_release
string.Data:
Next bugfix release:

Android 11 notice (UPDATED):

You can use c:geo with Android 11! Have a look at our FAQ for more details.

Changes:

  • Fix: Crashes due to problem in DB conversion after upgrade or when restoring backup
  • Fix: List creation dialog in light mode unreadable
  • Fix: Remove Android 11 warning from home screen

2020.10.29:

Trackable:

  • Fix: Adapt to another website change, fixing trackable codes not being recognized

Lists:

  • Fix: Offline logged caches still shown with orange line after clearing the log until list is reopened

Logging:

  • Fix: Crash when trying to log a cache on some devices

Other:

  • Fix: Strange characters in imported navigation target waypoints (e.g. from Adenventure Lab)

2020.10.10:

Trackable:

  • Fix: Adapt to website change, fixing trackable logging

Logging:

  • Fix: Crash when adding picture from camera

Other:

  • Fix: Prepare for website change regarding avatar loading
  • Fix: Major udpate to japanese translation

Version 2020.10.04:

Map:

  • Change: Show list markers also on waypoints
  • Fix: Zoom level difference between Google Maps and OpenStreetMap maps
  • New: Map downloader for OpenStreetMap offline maps (see map selector menu and Settings - Map)
  • New: Open local .map files in c:geo by tapping on them
  • New: Colorpicker for map lines offers \"default\" button
  • New: OpenstreetMap offline maps support \"default\" language
  • Change: Moved \"History track enable/disable\" checkbox to \"History track\" submenu as \"show\" / \"hide\" entries

Map: Individual routes:

  • New: Export route as GPX route file
  • New: Import route from GPX route file
  • New: Option added to center on route
  • New: Show warning before clearing a route
  • Fix: Crash on loading empty route item
  • Fix: Distance info still being displayed after clearing a route

Map: GPX tracks/routes:

  • Change: Renamed \"individual track\" to \"GPX track/route\"
  • New: Also load GPX files using the route format
  • New: Option added to center on track/route
  • New: Show Warning before overwriting an existing track/route
  • New: Show warning on \"load track/route\" if an empty track/route file was selected
  • Change: Group \"GPX track/route\" related entries into its own sub menu

Cache details:

  • Fix: Adapt to website change for trackable logbook on geocaching.com
  • New: Allow negative bearing angles for waypoint projection
  • New: Voice output: Estimate device orientation and transform coords when mobile is upright
  • Fix: Offline log remembers selected image
  • New: Offline logging now supports adding multiple images
  • Fix: Sped up offline logging with large cache lists
  • Fix: [NUMBER] only adds +1 for types found it / attended / webcam photo taken
  • New: Support the 4 new attributes at geocaching.com
  • New: Added option to remove all user-defined waypoints of a cache in one step
  • Changed sync logic for personal notes in caches to avoid duplication of personal notes
  • New: Option to globally deactivate waypoint extraction from personal notes
  • New: Personal note editor will grow automatically for longer texts
  • New: Personal note editor: Directly activate keyboard on opening
  • New: Personal note editor: Activate edit by tapping on text
  • New: Support backup for waypoints to notes, using format @name (type) coordinates<newline>\"user note\"
  • New: Remembers offline found count for every connector and applies those values to the [NUMBER] parameter on logging
  • New: Online-only found count variable added: [ONLINENUM]
  • Fix: Remembers waypoint coordinate format while scrolling in list
  • New: Offer Chirp Wolf app for chirp caches

Cache lists:

  • Change: Allow cache title to wrap to multi-line
  • Change: Widened colored found/offline log marker and removed textual \"Offline\" marker
  • Fix: GPX export - label for checkbox \"Include found status\"
  • Change: \"New list\" entry moved to top of list creation/selection dialog
  • Change: A newly created list for user-defined caches will now be named \"User-defined caches\" instead of \"Internal caches\" (does not change an existing list with user-defined caches)
  • New: Offer logging of premium caches from search for basic members of geocaching.com

Other:

  • New: Detect and report captcha on login to geocaching.com
  • Fix: Correctly detect wrong username/password on login to geocaching.com
  • New: Offer c:geo for navigation intents (eg.: from Lab Adventure app)
  • Change: Replace outdated undobar with snackbar
  • New: Include offline found counter on homescreen (configurable)
  • New: Individual route sort view: Tap on item to open cache details
  • New: Individual route sort view: Reorder using drag & drop
  • New: Display an error message (instead of crashing) when trying to restore an incompatible database version
  • New: Updated send2cgeo and GPS Status helper app icons
  • New: Add status info on BRouter availability to about - system screen
  • New: Added Chirp Wolf in useful apps list
  • Fix: Trackable links openened from within some mail programs would not open
  • Change: Set colorAccent to c:geo orange in many more places
  • Fix: Use 24 hour time formatter for logfile and export files for individual routes and history track
  • Many other small fixes
  • New: Added one-time messages framework
  • Logging: Added more info levels to logfile
  • Logging: Added option to write extended logfile with even more info
  • Logging: Read log settings from \"logfiles/log-properties.txt\" (if present)
  • Internal: Updated contributor\'s list
  • Internal: Added extension table to database
  • Internal: Fixed some issues with database structure
